section.title: Purpose of this document
section.para: This document aims at summarizing the requirements for the development of the BioPreDyn integrated software suite (deliverables 3.4, 7.2 and 8.3). It lists the main specifications as listed in the official description of work, or gathered by the development team when visiting the project partners. Critical use cases are then identified using these specifications.
This document does not describe the solution chosen; this will be detailed in the design notes.

section.title: Audience
section.para: This document is primarily intended to developers willing to understand the choices made during the BioPreDyn software suite design stage. It is particularly useful for maintenance and modification purposes.

section.title: Organization
section.para: This guide is divided into four main sections:

formalpara.title: Introduction
formalpara.para: A short introduction to the project context, and how the current document fits in the global picture.

formalpara.title: Specifications
formalpara.para: Review of the high level objectives of the deliverables 3.4, 7.2 and 8.3, through the study of the project's description of work and several visits to the project's partners.

formalpara.title: Use cases
formalpara.para: Formalization of the needs described in the Specifications section into use cases describing the main aspects and mechanisms to be captured by the design.

formalpara.title: References
formalpara.para: Articles and publications related to the project.
